flawed_nl_solution:
They have played 30 total games because 12 + 18 = <<12+18=30>>30
The proportion won by Archibald is 0.04 because 12 / 30 = <<12/30=0.04>>0.04
The percentage he has won in 4% because 0.04 x 100% = 4%

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.4, not 0.04. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
